title: Looking for an all caps script similar to graffiti art by Jean-Michel Basquiat
content:
Hi there,

I'm looking for a rather simple font, or something similar.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110232825im_/http:/typophile.com/files/samograffiti_3498.jpg)
  
It's the all caps font used by Jean-Michel Basquiat for his graffiti art, and in some of his paintings. I'm guessing an exact replica doesn't exist so I'll settle for one similar, that hasn't the distinctive E for example. Hoping that some of you can help me out here. 

thanks in advance

Geert
author: geertdekeyser

comments.content: [Especial Kay](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110232825/http:/www.scootergraphics.com/especialkay/index.html) from Scooter Graphics contains what he (Marty Pfeiffer) calls an "angry E"...

The font [Sedillo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150110232825/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/9721), by Mike Sedillo of the Apostrophic Lab, has a similar feel, although not the 'angry E'.

- Mike Yanega
